org.elasticsearch.index.fielddata

Class IndexFieldDataCache.FieldBased

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.elasticsearch.index.fielddata.IndexFieldDataCache.FieldBased
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.google.common.cache.RemovalListener<org.elasticsearch.index.fielddata.IndexFieldDataCache.FieldBased.Key,org.apache.lucene.util.Accountable>, org.apache.lucene.index.AtomicReader.CoreClosedListener, org.apache.lucene.index.IndexReader.ReaderClosedListener, IndexFieldDataCache
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    IndexFieldDataCache.Resident, IndexFieldDataCache.Soft
    Enclosing interface:
    IndexFieldDataCache

    public abstract static class IndexFieldDataCache.FieldBased
extends Object
implements IndexFieldDataCache, org.apache.lucene.index.AtomicReader.CoreClosedListener, com.google.common.cache.RemovalListener<org.elasticsearch.index.fielddata.IndexFieldDataCache.FieldBased.Key,org.apache.lucene.util.Accountable>, org.apache.lucene.index.IndexReader.ReaderClosedListener
    The resident field data cache is a *per field* cache that keeps all the values in memory.
